General.Name: J.Jill Inc
General.Description: J.Jill, Inc. operates as an omnichannel retailer for women's apparel in the United States. The company offers apparel, footwear, and accessories, such as scarves and jewelry. It sells its products under the J.Jill and three sub-brands, including Pure Jill, Wearever, and Fit brands through ecommerce platform and catalog, as well as its retail stores. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Quincy, Massachusetts.
General.Address: 4 Batterymarch Park, Quincy, MA, United States, 02169
